script: frappe.ui.form.on('Item', {	refresh(frm) 	{	    $(".form-shared").hide();		$(".form-tags").hide();		$(".form-sidebar-stats").hide();			    frm.remove_custom_button('Add / Edit Prices', "Actions"); 	    frm.remove_custom_button('Publish in Website',"Actions");// 		cur_frm.set_df_property("item_group", "hidden",1);	   // cur_frm.set_df_property("item_group", "read_only",1);// your code here		if (frappe.user_roles.indexOf("Vendor") == '0')		{	       //frm.page.menu.find('[data-label="Email"],[data-label="Links"],[data-label="Rename"],[data-label="Delete"]').parent().remove();	           	   	$(".form-assignments").hide();    	   //	$(".form-attachments").hide();    	   	$(".form-shared").hide();    		$(".form-tags").hide();    		$(".form-sidebar-stats").hide();    		$(".list-unstyled.sidebar-menu.text-muted").hide();    		$('.icon-btn').hide();	    }	    	   if (cur_frm.doc.equipment_verify == "Not Verify")        {            //  cur_frm.set_value("disabled",1);            //   cur_frm.set_df_property("disabled", "read_only",1);        }        else{            //  cur_frm.set_value("disabled","");             cur_frm.set_df_property("disabled", "read_only",0);        }	    if(frappe.user.has_role("Vendor") === true)	     {	        	         cur_frm.set_df_property("equipment_verify", "read_only",1);	          setTimeout(() => {    	        console.log("View Hide");    	        frm.remove_custom_button('Duplicate');    	             	            	        frm.remove_custom_button('...');    	        frm.remove_custom_button('Create Website Item')	        	         },0);  	    }	},	equipment_main_category:function(frm,cdt,cdn) {	    var a =frm.doc.equipment_main_category;	     cur_frm.set_query("equipment_brand", function() {             return {                        "filters": {                          "item_group_name": a,                        }                                            };	    });	},	onload:function(frm) 	{	   // if(frappe.user.has_role("Vendor") === true)	   //  {	   //      console.log("Vendor");	   //      cur_frm.set_df_property("equipment_verify", "read_only",1);	   //  }    }});

script: frappe.ui.form.on('Customer', {onload(frm) {    var a=rm.doc.lead_name    if(a!=""){   frappe.call({            method: 'frappe.client.get_value',            args: {                'doctype': 'Lead',                'filters': {'name': frm.doc.lead_name},                'fieldname': "inquiry_connect"            },            callback: function(r) {                                   console.log(r.message);                    frm.set_value('inquiry_connect', r.message.inquiry_connect);                    alert(frm.doc.inquiry_connect)                    // frm.refresh_field("your_seed_license_code");                              }        });    }    var b=frm.doc.opportunity_name    if(b!=""){        frappe.call({            method: 'frappe.client.get_value',            args: {                'doctype': 'Opportunity',                'filters': {'name': frm.doc.opportunity_name},                'fieldname': "inquiry_connect"            },            callback: function(r) {                                   console.log(r.message);                    frm.set_value('inquiry_connect', r.message.inquiry_connect);                    alert(frm.doc.inquiry_connect)                    // frm.refresh_field("your_seed_license_code");                              }        });    }    } })
